definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: If you don't have direct file access to the server, use this field to upload your shortcut icon.
sentences.chinese: 如果您无法直接存取伺服器，可以在此上传小图示。

sentences.english: The server part of the channel is located at the start of the server context sink chain.
sentences.chinese: 通道的伺服器部分位在伺服器内容接收链结的起始端。

sentences.english: The server part of the channel is located at the start of the server context sink chain.
sentences.chinese: 通道的伺服器部分位在伺服器内容接收链结的起始端。
无法重新启动印表机伺服器。

sentences.english: Blade volume is about 1/10th that of rack-mount servers.
sentences.chinese: 刀锋的容量只是机架型伺服器的十分之一。

sentences.english: Oh, to remind you—save the TPS reports on the server.
sentences.chinese: 噢，是要提醒你把TPS报告存上伺服器。

sentences.english: Includes a servo controller for up to 12 servos.
sentences.chinese: 包括一个多达12个服务系统的伺服器。

sentences.english: When during maintenance, the server will be down no more than 48 hours.
sentences.chinese: 维护期间，伺服器将停机不多于48小时。

sentences.english: Describes server-level groups and how to create and maintain them.
sentences.chinese: 描述伺服器层级群组以及建立和维护它们的方式。

sentences.english: FTP server and automatically upload and download files.
sentences.chinese: FTP伺服器，并自动上传和下载文件。

sentences.english: Routing group membership consists only of servers that are installed in the administrative groups.
sentences.chinese: 路由群组成员只包含安装于管理群组中的伺服器。

sentences.english: Demonstrates how to implement collection properties in server controls.
sentences.chinese: 第一个会示范如何在伺服器控制项中实作集合属性。

sentences.english: KL:Could you tell us which SC server do you go to often?
sentences.chinese: 能告诉我们你常去哪个伺服器？

sentences.english: From the perspective of a browser, a Web page is simply a long string of characters.
sentences.chinese: 从伺服器的观点而言，网页只是一长串的字元字串。

sentences.english: Servers use realms to partition protected resources.
sentences.chinese: 伺服器使用领域来分割受保护的资源。

sentences.english: Clients and servers use ports to distinguish which process each segment is associated with.
sentences.chinese: 客户端和伺服器使用埠来区分每个区段所结合的程序。

definition: network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)
